oracle_ref.description: Oracle reference in the form <spec>@<version>#<oracle> (see specs/conformance-validity.md).

input.description: Protocol input object for the oracle.

expected_outcome.description: Expected reason code outcome (PASS or FAIL.* or CONFVEC.*).

expected_canonical.description: Optional expected canonical JSON string (canonicalization vectors).

expected_hash.description: Optional expected SHA-256 hex digest (canonicalization vectors).

expected_result.description: Optional expected derived result object (e.g., reconciliation vectors).
